name: Escape from Hell (Indie Indian)
description:
This game was made for a GameJam by GameDevTV

The theme is: DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!

Looks like you fell into the deepest circle of hell, now you need to play the devil's game.

"Lasciate ogni speranza, voi ch'entrate (Abandon all hope, ye who enter here)"

Credits

  • Envinroment sound - "Disturbed Soundscape" by Eric Matyas Soundimage.org
  • 3D Model - Devil https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/devil-20bce4b4689c413f976afc86f59d4d1f
  • 3D Model - Creature https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/bomberman-devil-enemy-7bbfc057bea244e3b1022e8419...
  • 3D Model - Main Char https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/long-body-cartoon-base-d0da391b426d4302994ea3fb4...
  • 2D Sprite - Skull 2d Gothic vector created by freepik - www.freepik.com 
  • SFX - Free Sound
